mapper.update: update t_user_power set power=power+#{power} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select t1.power power,t1.user_id userId,t2.user_no userNo,t2.role_id as roleId,t2.`name` as userName ,t2.head_image_url userHeadImg from t_user_power t1,t_user t2 where t1.user_id=t2.id order by power desc limit 0,50
select * from t_user_power where power>0 order by power desc
